document_data.name: Lhargloroth
document_data.mainbody: '''Lhargloroth''' was a [[dragon]] who lived in [[Oroth]], in the realm of [[Eskorn]], [[Laerakond]].
document_data.Activities: As of [[1479 DR]], Lhargloroth was experimenting in Oroth, using living creatures to create strange monsters, most of them [[gibbering mouther]]s or rare sterile beasts, although a few of those were able to breed true.
document_data.History: Lhargloroth was a former servant who fled from [[Melauthaur]] at some point in the past and installed himself in Oroth. He was still there as of 1479 DR.
